note: An Information Security executive by day, I am also an author. My publishing credits include: THE GARDEN AT THE ROOF OF THE WORLD, currently being shopped for a TV/film deal by the January Hills production company, and JOHNNY TALON AND THE GODDESS OF LOVE AND WAR with The Wild Rose Press. I am a frequent panelist at ReaderCon, Arisia, Boskone, and served as a panelist at the 80th World Science Fiction Convention (Chicon 8) in 2022.
